message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, $12000 is above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product. Let me know if you're open to discussing that.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $11000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate you trying to meet me halfway. I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. That would be a good price for both of us.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to make sure it's worth it for me. I can offer it to you for $10500. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
Alice,  I appreciate you coming down a bit, but I'm still a little too high. I'm willing to go up to $9750.  That's a fair price that we can both agree on.
Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go below $10000. That's my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not going any lower.
